Fact.Name: Total Exempt Primary And Spouse Count
Fact.Description: Total Exempt Primary And Spouse Count

Fact.Name: Total Exemptions Count
Fact.Description: The sum of the number of claimed dependents and total exempt primary and spouse count

Fact.Name: Adjustments to income
Fact.Description: Adjustments to income to report on line 10 of Form 1040 and line 26 of Schedule.

The adjustments to income used in the calculatation of non-IRA deduction MAGIs to determine deducible amounts. Used in the Student Loan Interest Deduction and Social Security Benefits Worksheets. This should include be a sum of Schedule 1, lines 11 through 20, and 23 and 25

Fact.Name: Adjusted Gross Income
Fact.Description: Total income to report on line 11 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Modified Adjusted Gross Income for Student Loan Interest Deduction
Fact.Description: This is AGI, but without student loan interest deduction. Line 4 of the Student Loan Interest Deduction Worksheet used for Schedule 1

Fact.Name: Taxable income
Fact.Description: Taxable income as reported on line 15 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Qualified business income deduction
Fact.Description: Qualified business income deductions for line 13 of Form 1040

Fact.Name: Total deductions
Fact.Description: Total deductions as reported on line 14 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Wants standard deduction
Fact.Description: Will the taxpayer take the standard deduction?

Fact.Name: Standard or itemized deductions
Fact.Description: The taxpayer's choice of standard or itemized deductions as reported on line 12 of Form 1040. Currently only the standard deduction is supported.

Fact.Name: Other Deductions
Fact.Description: Deductions such as educator expenses and student loan interest

Fact.Name: Has adjustments
Fact.Description: Whether there are adjustments such as educator expenses and student loan interest greater than zero

Fact.Name: 8814 Included
Fact.Description: Is Form 8814 included

Fact.Name: 4972 Included
Fact.Description: Is Form 4972 included

Fact.Name: Other Included
Fact.Description: Is another form included

Fact.Name: Other Form Name
Fact.Description: the name of the other form included

Fact.Name: Rounded taxable income
Fact.Description: Income less than $100,000 uses the tax tables from the Instructions for Form 1040. This fact selects the "midpoint" that corresponds to each entry in the tax tables, for use in calculating tenative tax.

Fact.Name: Tentative tax from taxable income
Fact.Description: Tentative tax as reported on line 16 of Form 1040. Rev Proc .01 Tax Rate Tables ยง1(j)(2)(A|B|C|D) TODO: Replace Any/Equal with Include

Fact.Name: Total tentative tax
Fact.Description: Total tentative tax as reported on line 18 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Non-refundable credits
Fact.Description: Total amount of non-refundable tax credits as reported on line 21 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Has non-refundable credits
Fact.Description: Whether the taxpayer has non-refundable credits greater than zero
The max non refundable credit a TP can get

Fact.Name: Tax less non-refundable credits
Fact.Description: Tentative tax minus non-refundable tax credits as reported on line 22 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Line 21 of Schedule 2
Fact.Description: Other taxes, including self-employment Line 21 of schedule 2 for line 23 of form 1040

Fact.Name: Total tax
Fact.Description: Total tax as reported on line 24 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Total tax is incomplete
Fact.Description: The total tax calculation is incomplete, so the user cannot file

Fact.Name: Form 1099 withholding
Fact.Description: Federal income tax withheld from wages, as reported on line 25b of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Other Form withholding
Fact.Description: Federal income tax withheld from wages, as reported on line 25c of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Total withholding
Fact.Description: Total withholding as reported on line 25d of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: American Opportunity Credit
Fact.Description: American opportunity credit from Form 8863, line 8 (line 29 1040)

Fact.Name: Qualified for nonrefundable credits
Fact.Description: Whether the TP has qualified for any nonrefundable credits. This fact drives whether a summarytable is displayed in the credit summary page. If you change that table, you must also change this fact.

Fact.Name: Qualified for refundable credits
Fact.Description: Whether the TP has qualified for any refundable credit This fact drives whether a summarytable is displayed in the credit summary page. If you change that table, you must also change this fact.

Fact.Name: Total other payments and refundable credits
Fact.Description: Total other payments and refundable credits as reported on line 32 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Has refundable credits
Fact.Description: Whether the taxpayer has refundable credits is greater than zero

Fact.Name: Total payments
Fact.Description: Total payments as reported on line 33 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Overpayment
Fact.Description: The amount that total payments exceed total taxes. Report on line 34 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Tax With Credits Applied
Fact.Description: The amount that total payments exceed total taxes. Report on line 34 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Final tax amount
Fact.Description: The final tax amount -- either a refund or balance based on the positivity of the number

Fact.Name: Form 8888 Attached
Fact.Description: Do you have form 8888 attached?

Fact.Name: Amount Applied To Next Year Estimated
Fact.Description: Amount of line 34 you want applied to your 2023 estimated tax (line 36 1040)

Fact.Name: Due refund
Fact.Description: Is the taxpayer due a refund?

Fact.Name: Balance due
Fact.Description: The amount that total taxes exceed total payments. Reported on line 37 of Form 1040.

Fact.Name: Owes balance
Fact.Description: Does the taxpayer owe taxes?

Fact.Name: Zero balance
Fact.Description: Does the taxpayer have a zero balance due?

Fact.Name: Knockout no payments or credits
Fact.Description: TP is knocked out because they have no payments or credits
